local_intent: Re-confirm visibility of the white plate, move above it, perform fine approach-and-align to tolerance 0.005 within 1200ms, and verify alignment before descent.
assumptions: White plate remains visible and stationary during detection and alignment
Robot can reach the above-plate pose without collision
Timeout values from port_value_spaces are appropriate for the scene
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT step 'ApproachAndAlign target=white_plate' and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: it ensures the plate is detected, the arm moves above it, executes ApproachAndAlign with the annotated tolerance and timeout, and verifies position (IsAt) prior to LowerUntilContact and grasp.
